#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int scan()
{
int t=0;
char c;
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c<'0' || c>'9')
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c>='0' && c<='9')
{
t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+c-'0';
c=getchar_unlocked();
}
return t;
}

int main() {
	
	int t,n;
	t=scan();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=scan();
		if(n%3==0 || n%2==0)
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");
	}
	
	return 0;
}
